articles.title: India vs Bangladesh Highlights, Asia Cup 2023: Shubman Gill, Axar Patel Heroics In Vain As Bangladesh Beat India By 6 Runs - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India vs Bangladesh Asia Cup 2023 Highlights: Shubman Gill's fine-tuned 121 and Axar Patel's late surge of 42 went in vain as Bangladesh defeated India by 6 runs in the final Super 4 match
